remarks: The definition ~ cardval2 has the curious property that for non-numerable sets (for which ~ ndmfv yields ` (/) ` ), it still evaluates to a nonempty set, and indeed it contains ` _om ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jan-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Apr-2015.)
statement:
card2inf.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
card2inf $p |- ( -. E. y e. On y ~~ A -> _om C_ { x e. On | x ~< A } ) $.
$d A x y $.
